nodes.text: Frander's Bay was a space station orbiting the planet Chandrila. It was often frequented by pilots, who could be hired by visitors to the station. The Frander's Bay Shuttle transported passengers from Hanna City to Frander's Bay. When searching for an unregistered pilot, Han Solo and Lando Calrissian visited Frander's Bay, eventually hiring Taka Jamoreesa and their ZV-9 freighter Vermillion.
